## ProgramBuilder.buildRender() method

Generates shader codes for a render program

**Signature:**

```typescript
buildRender(options: PBRenderOptions): readonly [string, string, BindGroupLayout[], number[]];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [PBRenderOptions](doc/markdown/./device.pbrenderoptions.md) | The build options |

**Returns:**

readonly \[string, string, [BindGroupLayout](doc/markdown/./device.bindgrouplayout.md)<!-- -->\[\], number\[\]\]

a tuple made by vertex shader source, fragment shader source, bind group layouts and vertex attributes used, or null if build faild
